itemcol.filepath: \\192.168.2.2\00 - Departments\Common\scan\enviromental.officer\00- Pre arranque\Certificados Estrobos, Grilletes, Slingas\Lifting gear drilling Certificates\Lifting gear certificate for Mousehole 45FT BX201).pdf
itemcol.Paragraphs: B9 10* 200 kN* 8,0 T Sert. av/Cert. by : WENAAS AS AVD. LOCHNER Serienr. /Serial No : Prod. 345r/year : LMF-LPG-B9 Produsent/Maker : RUD Plassering/Location: Sik.faktor/Safety fact : : 4:1 Fagleders underskrift Ansvarlig i sakkyndig virksomhet Ble redskapene unders370kt av en sakkyndig virksomhet etter pr370vebelastningen og funnet 345 ha utholdt belastningen utendeformasjon og 345 v346re fri for brudd, brist eller andre feil?/Was the above gear examined by a competent person and found to have withstood the proof load without damage or deformation, and no fraction, cracks etc detected? Navn og adresse til fabrikanten eller forhandleren/Name and address of manufacturer or distributor Navn og adresse p345 den sakkyndige virksomhet, som utf370rte pr370ven og unders370kelsen/Name and address of manufacturer, company, association or distributor that performed the test and examination Den ansvarshavendes stilling i ovennevnte institusjon,sakkyndigvirksomhet som utf370rte pr370ven og unders370kelsen./Position of signatory that performed test and examination Pr370vene tilfredstiller kravene i <<Forskrift best. nr. 522 Vedlegg 1 Maskiner og best. nr. 555 Bruk av arbeidsutstyr.>>./The test are in compliance with rulesand regulations given in <<Forskrift best. nr. 522 Machinery>> and <<best. nr. 555 Use of Working Equipment>> Jeg attesterer herved p345 vegne av dem som er nevnt under ovenst345ende nr. 8*/9*) at de ovennevnte oppgaver er riktige./I certify on behalf of those mention above under no. 8*/9*) that information given above are correct. (7) (8) (9) (10) (11) Ja/Yes WENAAS AS AVD. LOCHNER WENAAS AS AVD. LOCHNER 306girsvei 8A 4688 KRISTIANSAND S Faglig leder/Inspector 27. mai 2008 Prod. ihht./acc. to. : DIN 5688 / M305 IKKE VARMEBEHANDLES/NOT TO BE HEAT-TREATED Testet ihht./Tested acc. to : *The lifting equipment is approved/tested by manufacturer. SAMSVARSERKL306RING/DECLARATION OF CONFORMITY CONFORMITY Dok.800.0

itemcol.filepath: \\192.168.2.2\00 - Departments\Common\scan\enviromental.officer\00- Pre arranque\Certificados Estrobos, Grilletes, Slingas\Lifting gear drilling Certificates\Lifting gear certificate for Mousehole 60FT BX202).pdf
itemcol.Paragraphs: pulley blocks and other lifting accessories Ordrenr/Order No: 1392413 Kundens ordrenr/Customer Order No: 4500144177 Wire 1x36,85mtr 26MM DYF 34x7LR G. W/MOUNTED SOCKET G-416 ONE END, OTHER END POINTED ITEM.10 - BA0061147 440894.6 1* * * 12,0 T Sert. av/Cert. by : WENAAS AS AVD. LOCHNER Serienr. /Serial No : Prod. 345r/year : 440894.6 2008 Produsent/Maker : CERTEX NORGE AS Plassering/Location: Sik.faktor/Safety fact : 5:1 Fagleders underskrift Ansvarlig i sakkyndig virksomhet Ble redskapene unders370kt av en sakkyndig virksomhet etter pr370vebelastningen og funnet 345 ha utholdt belastningen utendeformasjon og 345 v346re fri for brudd, brist eller andre feil?/Was the above gear examined by a competent person and found to have withstood the proof load without damage or deformation, and no fraction, cracks etc detected? Navn og adresse til fabrikanten eller forhandleren/Name and address of manufacturer or distributor Navn og adresse p345 den sakkyndige virksomhet, som utf370rte pr370ven og unders370kelsen/Name and address of manufacturer, company, association or distributor that performed the test and examination Den ansvarshavendes stilling i ovennevnte institusjon,sakkyndigvirksomhet som utf370rte pr370ven og unders370kelsen./Position of signatory that performed test and examination Pr370vene tilfredstiller kravene i <<Forskrift best. nr. 522 Vedlegg 1 Maskiner og best. nr. 555 Bruk av arbeidsutstyr.>>./The test are in compliance with rulesand regulations given in <<Forskrift best. nr. 522 Machinery>> and <<best. nr. 555 Use of Working Equipment>> Jeg attesterer herved p345 vegne av dem som er nevnt under ovenst345ende nr. 8*/9*) at de ovennevnte oppgaver er riktige./I certify on behalf of those mention above under no. 8*/9*) that information given above are correct. (7) (8) (9) (10) (11) Ja/Yes WENAAS AS AVD. LOCHNER WENAAS AS AVD. LOCHNER 306girsvei 8A 4688 KRISTIANSAND S Faglig leder/Inspector 19. september 2008 CONSISTING OF : 1x36,85mtr 26MM DYF 34x7LR GALV. 1960N/MM2 RHLL MBL=618kN BATCH:94514 W/MOUNTED OPEN SOCKET CROSBY G-416 24-26MM BATCH:SHD ONE END, OTHER END POINTED. TESTED AND PRODUCED ACC. TO PROCEDURE : BNV10 Prod. ihht./acc. to. : NS-EN 13411-4 Testet ihht./Tested acc. to : *The lifting equipment consists of components approved/tested by manufacturer. SAMSVARSERKL306RING/DECLARATION OF CONFORMITY CONFORMITY Dok.800.0
